reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the application collects Personal Data from its Users and specifies the types of data collected.
reply.reference: This Application collects some Personal Data from its Users. URL: https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/27173439

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The Personal Data collected by the app includes the email address.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that among the types of Personal Data collected by the app is the email address, providing specific insight into the data collection practices.
reply.reference: Among the types of Personal Data that this Application collects, by itself or through third parties, there are: email address. URL: https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/27173439

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the Personal Data is collected to allow the Owner to provide its Service, comply with legal obligations, respond to enforcement requests, protect rights and interests, and detect malicious or fraudulent activity. These purposes clearly declare the reasons for data collection and use.
reply.reference: The Data concerning the User is collected to allow the Owner to provide its Service, comply with its legal obligations, respond to enforcement requests, protect its rights and interests (or those of its Users or third parties), detect any malicious or fraudulent activity. URL: https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/27173439

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, users can opt out of data collection for direct marketing purposes at any time, free of charge and without providing any justification. If the user objects to processing for direct marketing purposes, the Personal Data will no longer be processed for such purposes.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that users can opt out of data collection for direct marketing purposes at any time without any cost or justification. This indicates that users have control over their data collection and processing for marketing purposes.
reply.reference: Users must know that, however, should their Personal Data be processed for direct marketing purposes, they can object to that processing at any time, free of charge and without providing any justification. Where the User objects to processing for direct marketing purposes, the Personal Data will no longer be processed for such purposes. URL: https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/27173439

long as such consent is not withdrawn. Furthermore, the Owner may be obliged to retain Personal Data for a longer period whenever required to fulfil a legal obligation or upon order of an authority.
Once the retention period expires, Personal Data shall be deleted. Therefore, the right of access, the right to erasure, the right to rectification and the right to data portability cannot be enforced after expiration of the retention period.

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties as mentioned in the privacy policy document.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that in some cases, the Data may be accessible to certain types of persons in charge or external parties appointed as Data Processors by the Owner, confirming that data is shared with third parties.
reply.reference: In addition to the Owner, in some cases, the Data may be accessible to certain types of persons in charge, involved with the operation of this Application (administration, sales, marketing, legal, system administration) or external parties (such as third-party technical service providers, mail carriers, hosting providers, IT companies, communications agencies) appointed, if necessary, as Data Processors by the Owner. The updated list of these parties may be requested from the Owner at any time. URL: https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/27173439
